name: Endothermic
description:
Endothermic is a single player first person horror game about escaping a heat-absorbing monster that’s taken over a spaceship. Survive by using your thermoregulation suit to endure the monster's bitter cold and manipulate it using heat. 

Controls: 

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift(hold while moving) - Sprint

NOTE: There are two demos that can be loaded, but neither are configured to return to the main menu. To load the other demo, please reload the game.
